name: Beneficent
title: Yaoyao: Beneficent
in_play_description: When Yuegui: Throwing Mode is created by your Yaoyao, who has this card equipped, and it has only 1 Usage(s) remaining, it deals +1 DMG and healing is increased by 1.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Yaoyao to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Yaoyao, equip this card.
After Yaoyao equips this card, immediately use Raphanus Sky Cluster once.
When Yuegui: Throwing Mode is created by your Yaoyao, who has this card equipped, and it has only 1 Usage(s) remaining, it deals +1 DMG and healing is increased by 1.
(You must have Yaoyao in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
